attributes.additional_details: Avanti west coast are shambolic, they can't run a train service and they should have the keys taken away from them. Bring back our red and white, shiny, reliable, on time create amazing pendolinos back and restore the pride back on our westcoast mainline
attributes.background: Since first group (avanti west coast ) took over the West Coast franchise from Virgin trains, avanti west coast has completely destroyed the westcoast mainline with in the short time of just under three years undoing the amazing transformation and world class service that virgin trains created.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/624149
